problem_statement: The solution violates time complexity, thread-safety, PQ security requirements, determinism guarantees, and verification requirements. It looks sophisticated, but it does not satisfy the formal constraints of the prompt.
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::compression should be deterministic (same input = same output)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::large logs should be truncated to 1KB for O(1) space
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::signature should be deterministic (same input = same signature)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::different inputs should produce different signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::compression ratio should be greater than 50%
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::telecomTopupRequest should process request with secure logging
